verses.roman:
ei sarva-śākhā pūrṇa--pakva prema-phale
yāre dekhe, tāre diyā bhāsāila sakale

synonyms: ei—these; sarva-śākhā—all branches; pūrṇa—complete; pakva prema-phale—with ripened fruits of love of Godhead; yāre dekhe—whomever they see; tāre diyā—distributing to him; bhāsāila—overflooded; sakale—all of them.
translation: All these branches, the devotees of Lord Nityānanda Prabhu, being full of ripened fruits of love of Kṛṣṇa, distributed these fruits to all they met, flooding them with love of Kṛṣṇa.
